alert.note: Alert for City of Falls Church; City of Manassas Park (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 12 at 5:26PM EDT until July 12 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MONTGOMERY...SOUTHEASTERN LOUDOUN...FAIRFAX...EAST CENTRAL FAUQUIER...AND CENTRAL PRINCE WILLIAM COUNTIES...THE CITY OF FAIRFAX...THE NORTHWESTERN CITY OF FALLS CHURCH...THE CITY OF MANASSAS PARK AND THE CITY OF MANASSAS... At 526 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near North Potomac to 6 miles southwest of Linton Hall, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. Locations impacted include... Germantown, Centreville, Dale City, Rockville, Bethesda, Gaithersburg, Reston, Annandale, South Riding, Herndon, Fairfax, Vienna, Falls Church, Broadlands, Lansdowne, Lowes Island, Brambleton, Mantua, Pimmit Hills and Poolesville. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: City of Falls Church; City of Manassas Park
